name: The Forbidden Fruits of Space Demo!
name_original: The Forbidden Fruits of Space Demo!
description:
This is a demo of my game The Forbidden Fruits of Space!

As mentioned, this is a demo - so it's not as pretty or well made as I'd like it to be!

Please feel free to let me know what you think on either of my socials!

Instagram @Caseys.Art

Twitter @CaseyBot5

Thank you!
